wikipedia_page.main: Lady Mary Rennell (1901–1981), born Mary Constance Vivian Smith, was an English artist working mainly in pencil, chalk and oils.

response: Rodd married Hon. Mary Constance Vivian Smith (later Lady Mary Rennell), daughter of Vivian Hugh Smith, 1st Baron Bicester and Lady Sybil Mary McDonnell (daughter of William McDonnell, 6th Earl of Antrim), on 3 August 1928. Together, they had issue:
